p: The time-series data (1964–2013) on maximum and minimum temperature, and rainfall from 19 weather stations spread over the entire coastal region, were obtained from the Bangladesh Meteorological Division (BMD), Agargaon, Dhaka. The historical data on frequency and intensity of floods and cyclones were collected from the Bangladesh Bureau of Statistics (BBS) report, and the hazard score was computed following the methodology of Barua et al. (2016) [ 63]. The district-level average drought intensity score was obtained from Alamgir et al. (2019) [ 64], calculated based on the time series precipitation data during 1994–2013 for the Kharif season.
